author: Simon Difford
description: Pouring the cranberry before the liqueur makes this drink easier to mix due to the ingredients specific gravities. The liqueur falls through the juice.
name: Grand Berry
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: POUR cranberry juice into ice-filled glass to half fill
ADD lime juice and Grand Marnier
